item.title: Spring Data JPA Query Method by Multiple Columns Example
item.description: In this tutorial, we will learn how to write a Spring Data JPA query method or finder method for multiple columns/fields. Consider the following Product entity class and if we want to retrieve products by their name OR description fields then here is the Spring data JPA query method: 1 public List<Product> findByNameOrDescription(String name, String description); Let’s create a complete example to understand end to end.
